page.title: 05Housing in the area
page.content: Barrow has many different types of houses.It consits of 2 streets 4 lanes and 1 close.The longest lane in Barrow is Church lane.Which has 20 new houses,15 old houses,7 cottages,9 bungalows,20 flats and 1 farm.We noticed that 10 of the cottages had stable at the front and one of them used to be a shop. In ingelby there are 15 houses,3 farms,and 1 pub called the John Thompson.The houses are about 50 to 100 years old.There are no schools,shops or post offices.The nearest shop is either Barrow,Stanton or Titnal. Tywford is a Hamlet the same as Ingelby.It has 12 houses and 1 resturaunt.Twyford is 5 miles away from Barrow.In Twyford thre is one resturaunt which wanted permission to sell beer and spirits.It was refused.
